results.title: Strong AI Demand; Solid Progress Made in Quick Commerce
results.section:
bution is prohibited.
2
Alibaba Group Holding Limited (BABA / 9988 HK)
Equity Research
November 25, 2025
 
(5) Qwen app drew more than 10m downloads in the week after its relaunch; (6) Its three-year
RMB380bn Capex plan may be scaled up given significant demand. The pace that it adds new
servers can hardly keep up with the growth in customers' orders. (7) In terms of priority, its
resources will be allocated to foundation model training, followed by inference on its Bailian
platform, and internal and external inference use. For external customers, BABA gives priority to
those using multiple products and services in BABA ecosystem compared to those merely using
GPU inference. (B) Quick Commerce. (1) UE has substantially improved since Sep driven by higher
fulfillment logistics efficiency, strong customer retention and rising AOV; (2) Since Oct, the UE loss
per order for QC has narrowed by 50% compared to Jul and Aug. (3) QC is maintaining a stable
order share with GMV market share trending upwards. (4) Non-beverage orders now account for
over 75% of total orders; (5) QC is driving growth of related categories in retail, such as food,
healthcare and supermarket categories. The quick commerce orders from Freshippo and Tmall
Supermarket increased by about 30% sequentially vs Aug. (6) It has onboarded Tmall brands to
QC channel to expand product offering and meet consumer needs for on-demand delivery. It has
onboarded offline stores from about 3,500 Tmall brands as of 31 Oct 2025; (7) QC is a core strategic
pillar in Taobao and Tmall platform upgrade, which is expected to bring RMB1tn incremental GMV
within three years. (C) CMR. (1) CMR is driven by improvement in take-rate, increasing penetration
of QZT and addition of service fees. The increase in monthly active consumers on Taobao app
drives incremental CMR; (2) In Dec quarter, CMR growth is expected to decelerate considering
the base impact as BABA started to charge the 0.6% technology service fee in Sep last year.

results.title: Alibaba Turning tokens into take-rate: The Alibaba flywheel
results.section:
eory and history suggest consumers 
typically capture the largest share of technology-driven efficiency via lower prices, 
greater variety, and better matching – i.e., consumer surplus – while 
producers/platforms retain value through scale, take-rate/pricing power, and new 
markets. For Alibaba’s commerce ecosystem, that implies: (i) merchants see opex 
savings and higher conversion, (ii) consumers benefit from better recommendations, 
content, and pricing, and (iii) Alibaba gains room to re-price services (ads, tools, 
agent platforms) as its contribution to outcomes rises – especially in lead-gen/traffic 
quality where value-based pricing is defensible. Net-net, we expect consumers to 
remain the largest beneficiaries, with Alibaba monetizing part of the incremental 
surplus via higher efficacy/ROAS and agentic workflow subscriptions. 
Investment implications: we believe GenAI in China is a bigger/faster curve than 
SaaS, and Alibaba is positioned to participate at every stage – compute, platforms, 
and apps – while directly improving merchant economics. As GenAI development 
drives cloud monetization, cost saving for merchant and incremental monetization in 
domestic e-commerce, we believe the stock narrative of Alibaba will go back to ‘tier 
1 China internet asset’, which implies a 15-20x PE multiple. As the investment in 
food delivery and quick commerce distort Alibaba’s FY2027 financial outlook, we 
encourage investors to value Alibaba on an FY2028 basis. The stock currently trades 
at 12x FY2028E PE on our earnings estimate, which offers significant room for re-
rating, in our view. We value Alibaba on 15x FY2028E PE, implying 36% upside to 
the current share price.

个是AI to B 的排头兵，另一个是AI to C 的探索者，共同构成了阿里集团AI 应

7.1.1 淘天集团，主要包括中国零售商业和中国批发商业 
中国零售商业业务主要由淘宝和天猫组成，二者共同构成全球最大的数字零售业务，是
阿里集团收入和利润的核心来源。淘宝和天猫一边连接着商家侧，另一边连接着用户侧，是
典型的互联网平台服务提供者，其收入大部分来自客户管理服务（CMR）。通过提供由各种
不同服务（广告、数据分析等）组成的全面解决方案，使商家能够触达客户、吸引客户、引
导客户购买、完成交易和留住客户，提升品牌及运营效率，从而从商家处获得客户管理收入。
客户管理收入主要有四类，包括基于点击次数计价，基于千次展示计价，基于时间计价和基
于销售计价。中国批发商业务1688.com 是中国最大的综合型内贸线上批发交易平台，
1688.com 也是阿里集团起家的业务，其为各行业的批发买卖双方提供交易撮合（商机平台+
流量平台），以会员、广告、增值服务的模式进行商业变现。

results.title: Alibaba Group Q2 2026
results.section: 一、AI+云业务进展与表现云业务增长驱动因素：云业务增长突出，本季度云智能营收增长34%。增长主要受两方面因素驱动：一是AI需求持续强劲，二是公共云使用量上升。此外，外部客户收入加速明显，增速达29%。AI相关产品延续强劲增长，已连续9个季度实现三位数同比增长。全栈AI能力建设：本季度公司持续强化全栈AI能力，覆盖高性能AI基础设施、基础模型及AI开发框架等方面。旗舰模型Q&A 3 Max在真实编码任务等基准测试中位居全球前列。目前，全栈AI能力已成为核心竞争优势。市场份额与客户拓展：市场份额方面，阿里云在混合云市场表现亮眼，年增长超20%，增速超行业水平，市场份额持续扩大；金融云业务增速也超市场，市场份额不断上升。在中国AI云市场，阿里云占据明显领先地位，市场份额超过第二至第四大供应商总和。客户拓展方面，NBA、万豪、中国银联、博世等已与阿里云在AI领域展开合作。二、消费业务发展与协同效应中国电商CMR增长：本季度，中国电商客户管理收入（CMR）增长10%。即时零售业务推动了淘宝APP月活消费者的增长，支撑了CMR扩张。截至10月31日，约3500个天猫品牌将线下门店接入即时零售业务

AliFish may take more share via competitive business model
AliFish is a leading IP licencing management and commercialisation platform in China 
(market share in APAC rose from 4.9% in 2022 to 35.3% in 2024). Established under 
Alibaba Group in 2016 and integrated into Damai  in 2018, AliFish functions as an 
intermediary between IP owners and brands/merchants. With its proprietary 'IP2B2C' 
model backed by the Alibaba ecosystem, AliFish has developed a full-chain service 
model that extends well beyond traditional licencing. AliFish monetises primarily 
through royalty-sharing arrangements with brands/merchants, typically structured as a 
minimum guarantee and revenue-sharing based on sales performance. The royalty rate 
is typically  3-10% of sales revenue generated by brands/merchants, of which AliFish 
shares a portion with IP owners.

results.title: Alibaba Group Holding: FY3Q26 Preview: Softer Macro & High Base for CMR; Cloud Intact
results.section:
Alibaba H-shares of HK$195.0 is based on 10x P/E on 
FY2027E Ecommerce Group net profit, 6.5x P/S on FY2027E Cloud 
Intelligence Group revenue, 2.0x P/S on AIDC Group revenue, 1.5x P/S on all 
other businesses. Our target multiples are benchmarked against comps. We 
also assign a 30% discount to net cash position, in-line with our SOTP for 
other internet peers. Our SOTP fair value comes to HK$195.0 per H-share.
Risks
Key downside risks that could prevent the shares from reaching our target 
price include: (i) failure in executing its new retail strategy; ii) investment 
spend and margins pressure become worse than expected; iii) slowdown of 
user traffic and online GMV and losing appeal to brands & merchants; iv) 
integration risks for newly acquired entities; v) slowdown of the Chinese and 
global economies and overhang of US-China or other trade disputes; and vi) 
regulatory risks on poor product quality and integrity of merchants.
Alibaba Group Holding
Company description
Alibaba was founded in 1999. In the years since, Alibaba has created one of 
the world’s leading internet e-commerce companies with an online 
ecosystem for buyers, sellers, third-party service providers, third-party 
payments, and strategic partners. The company was listed on the NYSE in 
September 2014 and completed its secondary listing in Hong Kong in 
November 2019.
Investment strategy
We rate Alibaba N-shares as Buy. We are positive on Alibaba given: i) it has the 
leading online commerce ecosystem in China (combined 80% market share in 
C2C and B2C segments); ii) its monetization rate has upside potential; iii)

results.section: 初恢复推进。当前Arbustus及Genevant诉Moderna专利诉讼的进展、后续流程及案件时间线如何？Arbustus及Genevant诉Moderna的专利诉讼于2022年2月提起，2024年2月完成Markman听证会，同年4月法院出具的裁决基本有利于Arbustus，随后Arbustus修改诉状。2022年Moderna以《美国法典》第1498条提出责任豁免的动议被法院驳回，认为需先完成事实发现以解决争议；2023年政府提交利益声明，2025年8月介入，明确1498条仅适用于单一合同，其他销售不适用该豁免，而Moderna主张1498条应覆盖所有Spike疫苗销售。此外，11月提交的Daubert动议尚未裁决，案件庭审定于2026年3月9日。1498法规的适用范围及相关先例情况如何？1498法规于1910年颁布，最初用于允许政府在支付合理使用费的前提下侵犯专利以采购军事装备，限制了专利持有人的禁令请求权及损失利润索赔权，仅能向政府主张合理 royalties，且政府承包商侵权时需起诉政府而非承包商。该法规最初适用于传统国防合同，近年扩展至IT技术及医药领域，但仅当承包商经政

results.title: 申报即担责！IPO撤单也不行，证监会出手，公证天业被行政处罚！
results.section: 造成危害后果等情形,量罚并无不当。综上,对于相关申辩意见不予采纳。根据当事人违法行为的事实、性质、情节与社会危害程度,依据《证券法》第二百一十三条第三款的规定,我会决定:一、对公证天业会计师事务所(特殊普通合伙)责令改正,并处以200万元的罚款;二、对刘勇、杨悦给予警告,并分别处以40万元的罚款。上述当事人应自收到本处罚决定书之日起15日内,将罚款直接汇交国库。具体缴款方式见本处罚决定书所附说明。同时,须将注有当事人名称的付款凭证复印件送中国证券监督管理委员会行政处罚委员会办公室备案。当事人如果对本处罚决定不服,可在收到本处罚决定书之日起60日内向中国证券监督管理委员会申请行政复议(行政复议申请可以通过邮政快递寄送至中国证券监督管理委员会法治司),也可在收到本处罚决定书之日起6个月内直接向有管辖权的人民法院提起行政诉讼。复议和诉讼期间,上述决定不停止执行。

results.title: IPO企业财务造假！律师事务所收行政处罚决定书，罚没228万！
results.section: 发票等证据证明,足以认定。我会认为,通力所在为思尔芯科创板IPO提供法律服务过程中未勤勉尽责,出具的法律意见书等文件存在虚假记载,违反《证券法》第一百六十三条的规定,构成《证券法》第二百一十三条第三款的违法行为。对于通力所的上述违法行为,思尔芯项目签字律师李**、郭*、王**是直接负责的主管人员。通力所、李**、郭*、王**及其代理人在听证及陈述申辩材料中提出已勤勉履职、不存在虚假记载等申辩意见,请求对其不予处罚。经复核,我会认为当事人执业行为明显未勤勉尽责,出具的法律意见书等文件存在虚假记载,对通力所提出的部分意见予以采纳,并已在处罚决定书中予以体现,对其他申辩意见不予采纳。在监管部门调查过程中,通力所及相关人员积极提供资料、配合调查。根据当事人违法行为的事实、性质、情节与社会危害程度,依据《证券法》第二百一十三条第三款的规定,我会决定:一、对上海市通力律师事务所责令改正,没收思尔芯科创板IPO法律业务收入114万元,并处以114万元罚款。二、对李**、郭*、王**给予警告,并分别处以20万元罚款。上述当事人应自收到本处罚决定书之日起15日内,将罚没款直接汇交国库。具体缴款方式见本处

valuation of US$78.5b in last round of official share buyback.

In June 2021, the District Court found two of the remaining four patents to be invalid, and trial on the two remaining patents began on August 6, 2021. On September 7, 2021, the jury rendered its verdict, finding that the Defendants infringed the two patents and awarding $6.6million in damages to Trading Technologies, while rejecting Trading Technologies’ claims of willful infringement and request for damages of at least $962.4million. On January 11, 2022, the District Court awarded Trading Technologies pre-judgment interest of $2.1million and post-judgment interest, and on March 31, 2022, granted Trading Technologies’ bill of costs of $490,232.On March 24, 2022, Harris Brumfield, the successor-in-interest to the patents-in-suit, filed a notice of appeal with the Court of Appeals of the Federal Circuit. After briefing on the appeal,oral argument was held on January 8, 2024. On March 27, 2024, the Federal Circuit affirmed the District Court’s judgment. On May 15, 2024, Harris Brumfield petitioned the Federal Circuit for a panel rehearing and rehearing en banc. On August 5, 2024, the Federal Circuit denied the petition and issued the mandate of the court on August 12, 2024. Harris Brumfield filed a petition for a writ of certiorari with the Supreme Court of the United States on January 2, 2025.On April 21, 2025, the Supreme Court denied Harris Brumfield’s petition for certiorari. On May 16, 2025, Harris Brumfield filed a petition for rehearing with the Supreme Court of the United States, which was denied by the Court on June 16, 2025. The judgment amount, including interest and costs, was paid by the Defendants to Harris Brumfield on June 18, 2025.Class Action MatterOn December 18, 2015, a former individual customer filed a purported class action complaint against IB LLC

results.title: 阿里巴巴-W(9988.HK)智启万物：千问APP重塑智能交互新纪元
results.section:
I 行业
从“聊天对话”迈入“办事时代”。展望后续进展，一方面AI 正
在从信息生成工具，演进为承接用户意图并完成任务的执行型入
口，另一方面从公司层面讲，阿里在AI 竞争中的核心优势，正在
从模型追赶转向生态不可复制性。 
事件 
1 月15 日，阿里巴巴在杭州举行千问APP 产品发布会，宣
布千问APP 完成自上线以来最重要的一次版本升级。作为阿里在
C 端AI 领域的核心产品，千问AI 全面接入淘宝、淘宝闪购、支
付宝、飞猪、高德等阿里核心生态业务，并同步上线超过400 项
AI 办事功能，向所有用户开放测试。发布会集中展示了千问在消
费、出行、生活服务等高频场景中的跨应用协同能力，标注着其
从“对话型AI”正式迈入“办事型AI”阶段。 
发布会现场，阿里集团副总裁、千问C 端事业群总裁吴嘉通
过“点奶茶”的场景演示展现了AI 在真实商业链路中的执行过
程。据官方披露，千问APP 自上线以来不到两个月，月度活跃用
户规模已突破1 亿，成为国内增长最快的AI 应用之一。

顶层战略愿景：AGENT 的兴起

area of the Asset Management segment.
•
Alexandre Camara (Head of Special Sits): Started his career at BTG
in 2003, his responsibilities include Corporate Structured Credit, NPL’s,
Legal Claims, HY and Structured Finance.
Compensation Structure | BTG operates under a partnership model, linking compensation directly to performance and shareholder value creation.
Partners remuneration consists of:
•
Fixed remuneration: Mainly salaries and benefits.
•
Variable bonuses: Tied to individual and business unit performance (% of the BU core revenue).
•
Equity participation: Top performers are eligible to become partners by purchasing shares (typically from existing partners) at the holding
company level, which is not publicly traded. BTG (listed vehicle) facilitates this process by providing financing to new partners at Selic rate.
This structure strongly incentivizes long-term growth, as partners’ wealth depends on increasing BTG’s equity value.
 
 
Key Risks
Cyclicality | In recent history, BTG has shown resilience to economic cycles. Even in what management described as “a very challenging market
in 2024,” the bank delivered record revenues and a 23% ROE. Despite outstanding recent performance, some businesses are inherently cyclical,
